pr_title: Changes to expand the usability of cache utils.

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -62,6 +74,190 @@ public static SharedPreferences getSharedPreferences(final String sharedPrefName
         return context.getSharedPreferences(sharedPrefName, Context.MODE_PRIVATE);
     }
